I always get "vac unable to verify game session" right when i wan to play with friends. I have never been vac banned or have used cheats. I have done all possible actions to fix it, but it doesn't work. The game lets me play randomly, one day I can play normally and at the other day i get "vac unable to verify game session".  
Game is great, but this problem is awful.

Great game with a lot of strategy. CSGO is a very unique FPS that stands out from every game. The people in game are mostly friendly but occasionally there will be toxic people. Best way to get better is to go on custom workshop maps for aiming, spray control and smoke grenades.
